content: this legal case involved a dispute between two parties referred to as av and tk regarding the division of their joint property av claimed the division of the property and compensation for the loss of certain assets while tk counterclaimed and also demanded the division of the property after a threeyear duration the court reached a final resolution denoted as v the court decided to leave a motorboat as the sole property of av and a passenger car as the sole property of tk tk was also responsible for the obligations arising from a loan agreement both parties were awarded compensation and the procedural costs were to be borne by both parties the document provides a summary of the case progress including the evidence presented the judgment based on the facts and the specific code articles referenced

metadata.cost: Each party covers own procedural costs, unspecified amounts
